subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Playing with the desperation of being down three games to none, the Rangers got a huge boost from team captain Jaromir Jagr and staved off elimination by beating the Penguins.
snippet: Playing with the desperation of being down three games to none, the Rangers got a huge boost from team captain Jaromir Jagr and staved off elimination by beating the Penguins.
